thread.title: Listen to Bonnie “Prince” Billy’s New Song “Treasure Map” From SPLC Benefit Compilation
thread.title_full: Listen to Bonnie “Prince” Billy’s New Song “Treasure Map” From SPLC Benefit Compilation

author: Evan Minsker
title: Listen to Bonnie “Prince” Billy’s New Song “Treasure Map” From SPLC Benefit Compilation
text:
Listen to Bonnie “Prince” Billy’s New Song “Treasure Map” From SPLC Benefit Compilation The four-song release also features William Tyler, Patterson Hood, and Adam Torres Bonnie “Prince” Billy Photo by Adam Berry/Redferns via Getty Images 
Bonnie “Prince” Billy has shared a new song called “Treasure Maps.” It appears on a new four-song compilation where all the proceeds are going to the Southern Poverty Law Center . It’s out May 5 via the Oxford, Mississippi record store, the End of All Music . It also features songs by William Tyler, Patterson Hood, and Adam Torres. Check out the song, the artwork (by Maude Schuyler Clay from the book Mississippi History ), and tracklist below. 
01 Adam Torres: Edge of the World02 William Tyler: Venus and Aquarius03 Bonnie “ Prince” Billy: Treasure Map04 Patterson Hood: Airplane Screams Artists In This Story
